short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upgrades HTTP to HTTPS for thegoodscentscompany.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Good Scents Company (TGSC) is a well-known and invaluable source of information to perfumers and chemists. Unfortunately, since the creator's passing, the site no longer passes some basic browser security requirements. This is a partial fix for it. Source code here: https://github.com/wearsshoes/tgsc-fixer
